snippet.title: Sleepless Night 2 [TRAILER]
snippet.description:
Sleepless Night 2: Ladies' Night(mare) is a horror/psycho sound novel. For full game experience you should play at night alone in your room and turn the volume up. There are no 18+ scenes in the game, I would recommend the game for 16+, but it is very scary and there are a lot of shockers in it, so be warned!

Credits:
Story & Characters -- Marcel Weyers
Music -- Marcel Weyers
Character art -- NoodleBrains
Backgrounds -- OokamiKasumi
Beta tester -- Sorakun, AntiquedFae, NeoAngelique
Engine -- Ren'Py

Specifications:
Title: Sleepless Night 2: Ladies' Night(mare)
Release: October 31, 2013
Genre: Horror/Psycho
Rated: 16+
Resolution: 1280×800
Platforms: Microsoft Windows, Mac OS, Linux
Endings: 24 (4 main endings + 20 death endings)
Languages: English, German

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Massimow
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/Massimow
Download: http://en.marcel-weyers.de/visualnovels/sleepless-night-2-ladies-nightmare
Walkthrough: http://en.marcel-weyers.de/visualnovels/sleepless-night-2-ladies-nightmare/walkthrough/
